name: Marionberry Kush
description: Like the fruit it is named for, Marionberry Kush is a delicious hybrid bred by Heroes of the Farm. A well-balanced cross of Raspberry Kush and Space Queen that puts off a full spectrum of fruity flavors, Marionberry Kush closely resembles her genetic “sister” Cinderella 99. There are six main phenotypes of Marionberry that all show a range of fruit flavors like passionfruit and raspberry. The aroma is smooth, sweet, and earthy with a sour twist. The effects are pronounced and uplift the mind almost immediately and then slowly relax the body without putting you to sleep.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Sleepy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Stress, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
